about_the_game:
Realm Engine Pro


Realm Engine is a free-to-play Virtual Tabletop but to access the ability to host and use the more advanced features of Realm Engine you will need a Pro Edition ToolKit.

This tool kit is mostly intended for Game masters and dungeons masters giving you the ability to host games online and adds some more advanced features.


Tabletop screen support allows those who have a screen or projector to extend a player view of Realm Engine onto a second monitor.




Play with friends online and take your party to the depths of the darkest dungeons with chat logs, individual miniatures, character portraits each player will have their very own setup for each of their characters.

What's the difference between the Free Edition and the paid?

At a glance, The pro version of Realm Engine is for your Game Master or Wargammer with the added ability to be able to import unlimited models, extending the game to a tabletop monitor or projector, and finally hosting games online, all of this is displayed in the table below.
